    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addDir​(java.lang.String path)
    Tokenize given path and add last token(directory) to corresponding path
    void addFile​(java.lang.String path)
    Tokenize given path and add last token(File) to corresponding path
    java.lang.String printFileSystem​(FileSystemTree.FileNode root, java.lang.StringBuilder result, int depth)
    Print all Tree with their depth so you can understand which nodes is child of which node
    void remove​(java.lang.String path)
    My remove method its delete given path node if this node has some child nodes it print this child nodes and ask user to wheather it is sure delete or not (if user enter 1 it delete these node so its children too) if given path has not some child nodes than it is remove this node directly without asking user.
    void removeNode​(FileSystemTree.FileNode root, java.lang.String find)
    My second helper method for remove method this method remove given string
    void removeWrapper​(FileSystemTree.FileNode root, java.lang.String path, java.util.List<java.lang.String> result, int flag)
    Helper method for my remove method This method find if there are more nodes that connect to the node which will delete
    void Search​(java.lang.String find)
    Search given string into structure and print all paths for founded string
    void searchWrapped​(FileSystemTree.FileNode root, java.lang.String find, java.lang.StringBuilder result, int index)
    my wrapper recursive function for search

      public void addFile​(java.lang.String path) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Tokenize given path and add last token(File) to corresponding path
      Parameters:
      path - Given path
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if you try add a file to a file node it throws an illegalArgumentExeption

    • remove

      public void remove​(java.lang.String path)
      My remove method its delete given path node if this node has some child nodes it print this child nodes and ask user to wheather it is sure delete or not (if user enter 1 it delete these node so its children too) if given path has not some child nodes than it is remove this node directly without asking user.
      Parameters:
      path - given string for deleted node path

    • removeWrapper

      public void removeWrapper​(FileSystemTree.FileNode root, java.lang.String path, java.util.List<java.lang.String> result, int flag)
      Helper method for my remove method This method find if there are more nodes that connect to the node which will delete
      Parameters:
      root - root node of my structure
      path - path of deleted node
      result - list of strings that hold deleted nodes connections
      flag - flag for check

    • removeNode

      public void removeNode​(FileSystemTree.FileNode root, java.lang.String find)
      My second helper method for remove method this method remove given string
      Parameters:
      root - root of the strutcture
      find - deleted node name
